ValidationRule.description: Enforce fields required for processing staged records
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Staged" ), OR( ISBLANK( Program__c ), ISBLANK( Course__c ), ISBLANK( Course_Session_Name__c ), ISBLANK( Course_Option_Name__c ), ISBLANK( Session__c ), ISBLANK( Days_of_Week__c ), ISBLANK( Start_Date__c ), ISBLANK( End_Date__c ), ISBLANK( Start_Time__c ), ISBLANK( End_Time__c ), ISBLANK( GL_Account__c ), ISBLANK( Primary_Facility__c ), ISBLANK( Public_Price__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Staged records must have a Program, Course, Course Session Name, Course Option Name, Session, Days of Week, Start Date, End Date, Start Time, End Time, GL Account, Primary Facility, and Public Price.
